previous_statement: PROOF OVERVIEW: We prove H = A_N or S_N by combining six validated lemmas: (1) transitivity, (2) primitivity, (3) 3-cycle existence, (4) Jordan's theorem, (5) parity analysis, (6) A_N vs S_N criterion.
new_statement: PROOF OVERVIEW: We prove H = A_N or S_N by combining five validated lemmas and one admitted classical axiom: (1) transitivity (Lemma 5, validated), (2) primitivity (Lemma 11, validated), (3) 3-cycle existence (Lemma 9, validated), (4) Jordan's theorem (Lemma 12, admitted), (5) parity analysis (Lemma 14, validated), (6) A_N vs S_N criterion (Lemma 15, validated).
